name: hortusfox
description: HortusFox Web is a web interface for managing gardening and plant care data. Users can log plant details, tasks and observations, giving hobby gardeners a simple way to track their garden over time on self hosted infrastructure.
features: Plant Database: Maintain detailed records for each plant including species, location, and care requirements.
Care Tracking: Log watering, fertilizing, pruning, and other maintenance activities.
Task Management: Create and track gardening tasks with due dates and reminders.
Photo Journal: Document plant growth with photos and timestamped observations.
Growth Monitoring: Track plant health, size, and development over time.
Location Management: Organize plants by garden beds, pots, or indoor/outdoor locations.
Care Schedules: Set up recurring care tasks based on plant-specific needs.
Notes and Observations: Record detailed observations about plant health and conditions.
